import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/BuildingManager.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Checklist(){const[checkedItems,setCheckedItems]=useState([]);const items=["Gas control System","Water supplyement System","Electrical Control System","Lift Control System"// ... items
];const handleCheckChange=event=>{const value=event.target.value;if(event.target.checked){setCheckedItems([...checkedItems,value]);}else{setCheckedItems(checkedItems.filter(item=>item!==value));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"checklist-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"No."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"ACTIVITIES"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"DATE:"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:items.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:index+1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",value:item,checked:checkedItems.includes(item),onChange:handleCheckChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:item})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[" ","11/10/2024"]})]},index))})]})});}export default Checklist;
